description: `PieChart` is a circular graphic that is divided into slices to illustrate proportions or percentages.

data.description: Array of data to plot with pie chart.

getValue.description:
Accessor for getting the values plotted on the pie chart.
If not provided, just uses the value itself at given index.

total.description:
Total expected sum of all the pie slice values.
If provided && slices don't add up to total, an "empty" slice will be rendered for the rest
If not provided, will be the sum of all values (ie. all values will always add up to 100%)

width.description:
Optional width of the SVG
if not passed in and height is passed in, same # is used for both (ie. width=100 means height=100 also)
if neither is passed, but radius is, radius+margins is used
if neither is passed, and radius isn't either, 150 is used

height.description:
Optional height of the SVG
if not passed in and width is passed in, same # is used for both (ie. width=100 means height=100 also)
if neither is passed, but radius is, radius+margins is used
if neither is passed, and radius isn't either, 150 is used

radius.description: Optional radius of the pie chart, inferred from margin/width/height if not provided.

holeRadius.description: Optional radius of the "donut hole" circle drawn on top of the pie chart to turn it into a donut chart.

centerLabel.description: Optional label text to display in the middle of the pie/donut.

centerLabelClassName.description: Class attribute to be applied to center label.

centerLabelStyle.description: Inline style object to be applied to center label.

getPieSliceLabel.description:
Accessor for getting labels that are rendered outside each slice of the pie chart.
If not provided no labels will be rendered.

pieSliceLabelStyle.description:
Inline style object applied to each slice label.
When a function is provided it will receive the value for the slice and should return the
style object for that slice's label.
Used along with `getPieSliceLabel`.

pieSliceLabelDistance.description:
Distance to render the label from the outer edge of the pie chart. Positive numbers will
move away from the center and negative numbers will move toward the center.
When a function is provided it will receive the value for the slice and should return the
distance for that slice's label.
Used along with `getPieSliceLabel`.

pieSliceClassName.description:
Class attribute to be applied to each pie slice,
or accessor function which returns a class.

markerLineValue.description: Value for where to place markerline.

markerLineClassName.description: Class attribute to be applied to marker line.

markerLineStyle.description: Inline style object to be applied to marker line.

markerLineOverhangInner.description: Number of pixels marker line hangs inside the pie chart.

markerLineOverhangOuter.description: Number of pixels marker line hangs outside the pie chart.

onMouseEnterLine.description: `mouseenter` event handler callback, called when user's mouse enters the marker line.

onMouseMoveLine.description: `mousemove` event handler callback, called when user's mouse moves within the marker line.

onMouseLeaveLine.description: `mouseleave` event handler callback, called when user's mouse leaves the marker line.

onMouseEnterSlice.description: `mouseenter` event handler callback, called when user's mouse enters a pie slice.

onMouseMoveSlice.description: `mousemove` event handler callback, called when user's mouse moves within a pie slice.

onMouseLeaveSlice.description: `mouseleave` event handler callback, called when user's mouse leaves a pie slice.
